title: Fauxgo Cheese Poofs
ingredients: 1 oz shredded parmesan or cotija cheese

directions.text: Combine butter, salt and milk in a sauce pan and bring to low boil.
As soon as it boils transfer to a mixer and set on low.
Slowly add flour, then cheese, eggs, sugar and oil.
Spray down 1 mini muffing tins with cooking spray and spoon in batter.
